txt.en: 'Thank you, [placeholder]! These will be very useful in crafting some excellent armour for the Rangers.'
Drakes can be found in the western valley of Ram Dúath, north of Esteldín.\n\nYou should collect drake-wings from the pass of Ram Dúath.
Melthindir is at Esteldín, standing watch outside the east entrance.\n\nYou should bring the leather you collected to Melthindir.
The wings of drakes are tough and leathery, and with the right preparation, could make a sturdy suit of armour.
The wings of drakes are tough and leathery, and with the right preparation, could make a sturdy suit of armour.\n\nYou should collect drake-wings from the pass of Ram Dúath.

Drakes can be found in the western valley of Ram Dúath, north of Esteldín.\n\nTo finish the armour he is crafting for the people of Trestlebridge, Gondranc is in need of the leathery hide from the wings of drakes. He has asked you to gather allies and hunt drakes in Ram Dúath.

'You have done well, [placeholder]. With aurochs-mantles, worm-scales, drake-leather, and the methods of the Earth-kin, the folk of Trestlebridge will receive fine armour indeed.\n\n'You have done so much, but alas this is all I have to offer you as a reward.'
Great job getting this leathery stuff.
'Have you brought the drake-leather yet? No? I must have that leather before I can finish this armour. You can find the drakes in the western valley of Ram Dúath.'
Bring the drake-hides back to Gondranc
Drakes can be found in the western valley of Ram Dúath, north of Esteldín.\n\nYou should collect drake-wings from the pass of Ram Dúath.
